books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, recruits and trains a doctor from Jerusalem to help capture a secret ISIS terrorist in France.
books.name: THE BLACK WIDOW

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Noah Hawley
books.description: After a private jet crashes, a firestorm of media madness ensues.
books.name: BEFORE THE FALL

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: While trying to choose between two suitors, a young widow realizes that her life is in danger; originally published in 2003.
books.name: THE GUARDIAN

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: Two sisters — one a successful lawyer with a small child and an unhappy marriage, the other a single teacher who yearns to be a mother — struggle toward forgiveness after 15 years of estrangement.
books.name: FIRST COMES LOVE

books.author: by Emma Cline
books.description: In the summer of 1969, a California teenager is drawn to a Manson-like cult.
books.name: THE GIRLS

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Hired by Olympic organizers to protect the Rio games, Jack Morgan of Private, an international security and consulting firm, encounters dangerous threats.
books.name: THE GAMES

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A year in the intertwined lives of three international couples who participate in a special dinner in Paris.
books.name: MAGIC

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Bad-guy Brady acquires psychic powers in the conclusion of the Bill Hodges trilogy.
books.name: END OF WATCH

books.author: by James Patterson with Maxine Paetro
books.description: An accused murderer tries to prevent his trial in this Women's Murder Club novella.
books.name: THE TRIAL

books.author: by Linda Castillo
books.description: Chief of Police Kate Burkholder goes undercover as a widow in a reclusive Amish community to investigate a girl's death.
books.name: AMONG THE WICKED

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Setting their own romantic turmoil aside, three sisters come together for their mother's wedding.
books.name: DAUGHTERS OF THE BRIDE
